blocks.name: diff.cvol.s
diff.cvol.c
diff.cvol.w
df-ovol
blocks.content: Define the outer Lebesgue measure for subsets of the reals. Here ` f ` is a function from the positive integers to pairs ` <. a , b >. ` with ` a <_ b ` , and the outer volume of the set ` x ` is the infimum over all such functions such that the union of the open intervals ` ( a , b ) ` covers ` x ` of the sum of ` b - a ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.) (Revised by AV, 17-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: df-vol
blocks.content: Define the Lebesgue measure, which is just the outer measure with a peculiar domain of definition. The property of being Lebesgue-measurable can be expressed as ` A e. dom vol ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)

  elin2d(cfv(c0, c1), cxp(cr, cr), cle, wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))
  1st2nd2(cfv(c0, c1), cr, cr)
  ffvelrn(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), c1)
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), w3a(wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cr), wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), wa(wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cr))), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cr)), wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))))

  elin(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cle, cxp(cr, cr))
  anbi12i(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cle), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cxp(cr, cr)), wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cr)))

blocks.name: ovolficc
blocks.content: Unpack the interval covering property using closed intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolficc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)))), wb(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c1)))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cn, wa(wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: ovolficcss

  eqsstrd(cfv(cicc, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cr, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cicc, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cicc, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cicc, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))), cfv(cicc, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))

blocks.name: ovolfsval

blocks.origin:
thm ovolfsval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), co(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cmin, cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c2, c1), co(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cmin, cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c0, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))
  syl5eq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0), c1), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))
  fveq1i(c2, c1, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0))
  fvco3(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), c1, ccom(cabs, cmin))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)), cmin, cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1))), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c0, c1)), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), cfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1)))), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))
  fveq2d(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(c0, c1), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wcel(c1, cn)))

  ovolfcl(c0, cv(hs0))

  ancoms(wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cr), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cr), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cmin, cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wbr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: ovolsf
blocks.content: Closure for the partial sums of the interval length function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolsf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wf(c1, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c2, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cseq(nat1, caddc, c2))
} = {
  sylibr(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wf(c1, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wf(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  seqf(hs0, hs1, nat1, caddc, c2, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  nnuz()
  1zzd(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, c2, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  ovolfsf(c0, c2)
  adantl(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  ge0addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  feq1i(c1, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cseq(nat1, caddc, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs1.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.w(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  diff.hs1.w(wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
}

  ffvelrnda(hs0, cn, c2, (0[[,)]+∞), (c0 : ℕ →(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))))

  ge0addcl(hs0, hs1)

thm ovolval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), cinf(c1, cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), cinf(c1, cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, cpw(cr)))
  elpw2(c0, cr)
  reex()
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cpw(cr), covol, cinf(c1, cxr, clt), cinf(crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))), cxr, clt))
  infeq1d(crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))), cxr, clt, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))), c1, crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt)))), wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt)))))
  rexbidv(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))
  cleq1lem(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt)))
  df-ovol(hs0, s0, s1)
  infex(c1, cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cr))
  diff.hs0.c(cinf(c1, cxr, clt))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ovolval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ℝ →(vol* ` c0)= inf(c1, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)= inf(c1, ℝ*, <), c0 ∈ P(ℝ))
  elpw2(c0, cr)
  reex()
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, P(ℝ), covol, inf(c1, ℝ*, <), inf({ s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}, ℝ*, <))
  infeq1d({ s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}, cxr, clt, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr({ s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}, c1, { s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}, hs0 = c0)
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(hs0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <))), ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <))))
  rexbidv(s1, ((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ), hs0 = c0, (hs0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)), (c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))
  cleq1lem(hs0, c0, ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1)), s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <))
  df-ovol(hs0, s0, s1)
  infex(c1, cxr, clt)
  xrltso()

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.name: elovolm
blocks.content: Elementhood in the set ` M ` of approximations to the outer measure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elovolm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c2, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s0))))), wceq(c0, csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s0)))), cxr, clt)))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, cxr, wrex(s0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c2, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s1), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s0)))), cxr, clt))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

thm ovolsslem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ)→(vol* ` c0)[≤](vol* ` c1))
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}
  ⊣ c3 = { s0 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(s1 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c1 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ s1))∧ s0 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ s1)))), ℝ*, <)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  breqtrrd((vol* ` c0), cle, (vol* ` c1), inf(c3, ℝ*, <), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ))

blocks.name: ovolss
blocks.content: The volume of a set is monotone with respect to set inclusion. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: ovolsscl
blocks.content: If a set is contained in another of bounded measure, it too is bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: ovolssnul
blocks.content: A subset of a nullset is null. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ovollb2
blocks.content: It is often more convenient to do calculations with *closed* coverings rather than open ones; here we show that it makes no difference (compare ~ ovollb ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: The volume of a denumerable set is 0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: ovolun
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is finitely sub-additive. (Unlike the stronger ~ ovoliun , this does not require any choice principles.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1))))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1))), wral(hs0, crp, wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)), caddc, cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crp, wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)), caddc, cv(hs0))))
  ovolunlem2(c0, c1, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wcel(cv(hs0), crp)))
  simpll(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), crp))
  simplr(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), crp))
  simpr(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wcel(cv(hs0), crp))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wb(wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1))), wral(hs0, crp, wbr(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cle, co(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)), caddc, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cxr), wcel(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)), cr))
  syl(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))), wcel(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), cxr), wss(cun(c0, c1), cr))
  ad2ant2r(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr), wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr), wss(cun(c0, c1), cr))
  biimpi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wss(c1, cr)), wss(cun(c0, c1), cr))
  unss(c0, cr, c1)
  ovolcl(cun(c0, c1))
  ad2ant2l(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr), wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr), wcel(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)), cr))
  readdcl(cfv(covol, c0), cfv(covol, c1))
  xralrple(hs0, cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)), co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr)), wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(covol, c0), caddc, cfv(covol, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ovolun(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ))→(vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤]((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)), (vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤]((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+,(vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤](((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))[+]hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crp, ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)), (vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤](((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))[+]hs0))
  ovolunlem2(c0, c1, hs0, (((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ))∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+))
  simpll((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ), (c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ+)
  simplr((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ), (c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ+)
  simpr(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)), hs0 ∈ ℝ+)
  syl2anc(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)), ((vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤]((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+,(vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))[≤](((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))[+]hs0))), (vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))∈ ℝ*, ((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))∈ ℝ)
  syl(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)), (vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1))∈ ℝ*, (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ ℝ)
  ad2ant2r(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ, c1 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ, (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ ℝ)
  biimpi((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ), (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ ℝ)
  unss(c0, cr, c1)
  ovolcl((c0 ⋃ c1))
  ad2ant2l(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ, c1 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ, ((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1))∈ ℝ)
  readdcl((vol* ` c0), (vol* ` c1))
  xralrple(hs0, (vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1)), ((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧(c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)))
  diff.hs0.c((vol* `(c0 ⋃ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(((vol* ` c0)[+](vol* ` c1)))
}

  adantr(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wss(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), nat0)), wbr(cfv(covol, c0), clt, cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1))), wss(c1, cr))
  syl6eqel(cfv(covol, c1), cr, nat0, wa(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wss(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), nat0)), wbr(cfv(covol, c0), clt, cfv(covol, cun(c0, c1)))))
  0re()

blocks.name: ovolfiniun
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is finitely sub-additive. Finite sum version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolfiniun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr)))), wbr(cfv(covol, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cle, csu(s0, c0, cfv(covol, c1))))

blocks.name: ovoliun
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is countably sub-additive. (Many books allow ` +oo ` as a value for one of the sets in the sum, but in our setup we can't do arithmetic on infinity, and in any case the volume of a union containing an infinitely large set is already infinitely large by monotonicity ~ ovolss , so we need not consider this case here, although we do allow the sum itself to be infinite.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovoliun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(covol, ciun(s0, cn, c0)), cle, csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {

  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), crp), wral(hs2, cn, wcel(cfv(covol, csb(s0, cv(hs2), c0)), cr)))

  syl(w0, wb(wceq(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cpnf), wn(wbr(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), clt, cpnf))), wcel(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cxr))

thm ovoliun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ c1 = seq(1(+, c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(vol* ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ)→ c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ)→(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61d(w0, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞)

  mpbirand(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, -∞[<]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))

  mnfxr()

  syl2anc(w0, (c1 ` 1)[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), ran(c1)⊆ ℝ*, (c1 ` 1)∈ ran(c1))
  sylancl(w0, (c1 ` 1)∈ ran(c1), c1[Fn]ℕ, 1 ∈ ℕ)
  ffnd(c1, cn, cr, w0)

  fnfvelrn(c1, cn, nat1)
  supxrub(ran(c1), (c1 ` 1))
  syl(w0, (sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ ↔(-∞[<]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞)), sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)

  mpbird((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+,(vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤](sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[+]hs1)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, crp, (w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤](sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[+]hs1))
  syl5eqbr((vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0)), cle, (sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[+]hs1), (vol* ` ⋃(hs2 ∈ ℕ,[hs2 / s0]c0)), ((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))
  fveq2i(covol, ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0), ⋃(hs2 ∈ ℕ,[hs2 / s0]c0))
  cbviun(s0, hs2, cn, c0, [hs2 / s0]c0)
  nfcv(hs2, c0)
  ovoliunlem3(hs2, [hs2 / s0]c0, c1, hs1, c2, ((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))
  eqtri(c2, (hs2 ∈ ℕ ↦(vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0)), (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(vol* ` c0)))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs2, cn, (vol* ` c0), (vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0))
  r19.21bi(hs2, cn, ((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+), [hs2 / s0]c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ ℕ,[hs2 / s0]c0 ⊆ ℝ))
  sylib(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ ℕ,[hs2 / s0]c0 ⊆ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ⊆ ℝ))

  r19.21bi(hs2, cn, ((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+), (vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0)∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ ℕ,(vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0)∈ ℝ))
  sylib(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ ℕ,(vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0)∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ))

  nfcv(s0, covol)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs2, c0)
  eleq1d((vol* ` c0), cr, (vol* `[hs2 / s0]c0), s0 = hs2)
  fveq2d(covol, c0, [hs2 / s0]c0, s0 = hs2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs2, c0)
  simplr(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ+)
  simpr((w0 ∧ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), hs1 ∈ ℝ+)
  sylan(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, ((vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)↔ ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+,(vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤](sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[+]hs1))), (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))∈ ℝ*)
  xralrple(hs1, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0)), sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))
  sylbird(w0, ¬ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  syl(w0, (sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)= +∞ ↔ ¬ sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞), sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  syl(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, ran(c1)⊆ ℝ*)
  syl6ss(ran(c1), cxr, cr, w0)
  frnd(c1, cr, cn, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c1 : ℕ → ℝ), (seq(1(+, c2)): ℕ → ℝ))
  serfre(hs0, nat1, c2, cn, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, cn, c2, cr, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c2, cn, cr, (vol* ` c0), w0)
  feq1i(c1, cn, cr, seq(1(+, c2)))
  ressxr()
  supxrcl(ran(c1))
  nltpnft(sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <)= +∞, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]sup(ran(c1), ℝ*, <), (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]+∞)
  syl(w0, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))[≤]+∞, (vol* ` ⋃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))∈ ℝ*)

blocks.name: ovoliun2
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is countably sub-additive. (This version is a little easier to read, but does not allow infinite values like ~ ovoliun .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: shft2rab
blocks.content: If ` B ` is a shift of ` A ` by ` C ` , then ` A ` is a shift of ` B ` by ` -u C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm shft2rab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl6eqr(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2)), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2))), w0)
  abbi2dv(s0, c0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2)))
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  sseld(cv(s0), c0, cr, w0)
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  3bitrd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0))), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0))
  eleq12d(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  subneg(cv(s0), c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(c2, crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wb(wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0))), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cr))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(c1, cr))

  eleq1d(co(cv(s1), cmin, c1), c0, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, c1)))
  oveq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1)
  eleq1d(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))

thm ovolshftlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c0, cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpt(s3, cn, cop(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c5, cv(s3))), caddc, c3), co(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c5, cv(s3))), caddc, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c5, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))

  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c0), cxr, clt), c1)), diffss(s0, s2))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c0), cxr, clt), c1)), diffsc(s2, c3))

blocks.name: ovolshftlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ovolshft . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolshftlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s1)))), cxr, clt))))), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, crab(s2, cr, wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, c2), c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s3, cxr, wrex(s4, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c3, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(s4))))), wceq(cv(s3), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(s4)))), cxr, clt))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

blocks.name: ovolshft
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function is shift-invariant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Sep-2020.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {

  eqssd(crab(hs1, cxr, wrex(hs0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs1), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt))))), crab(hs3, cxr, wrex(hs2, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c1, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs3), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs2)))), cxr, clt))))), w0)
  ovolshftlem2(hs1, hs0, s0, hs3, hs2, c0, crab(hs3, cxr, wrex(hs2, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c1, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs3), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs2)))), cxr, clt))))), c2, c1, w0)
  ovolshftlem2(hs3, hs2, hs4, hs1, hs0, c1, crab(hs1, cxr, wrex(hs0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs1), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt))))), cneg(c2), c0, w0)

  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c0), cinf(crab(hs1, cxr, wrex(hs0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs1), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt))))), cxr, clt)), wss(c0, cr))
  ovolval(hs1, hs0, c0, crab(hs1, cxr, wrex(hs0, co(cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(hs1), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), cv(hs0)))), cxr, clt))))))

  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.hs0.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs3.c(cneg(c2))

thm ovolshft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(vol* ` c0)=(vol* ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = { s0 ∈ ℝ |(s0[-]c2)∈ c0 })
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((vol* ` c0), (vol* ` c1), inf({ hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))}, ℝ*, <), inf({ hs3 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs2 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c1 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs2))∧ hs3 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs2)))), ℝ*, <)))}, ℝ*, <), w0)
  infeq1d({ hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))}, cxr, clt, { hs3 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs2 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c1 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs2))∧ hs3 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs2)))), ℝ*, <)))}, w0)
  eqssd({ hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))}, { hs3 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs2 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c1 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs2))∧ hs3 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs2)))), ℝ*, <)))}, w0)
  ovolshftlem2(hs1, hs0, s0, hs3, hs2, c0, { hs3 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs2 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c1 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs2))∧ hs3 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs2)))), ℝ*, <)))}, c2, c1, w0)
  ovolshftlem2(hs3, hs2, hs4, hs1, hs0, c1, { hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))}, -u(c2), c0, w0)
  renegcld(c2, w0)
  shft2rab(hs4, s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (vol* ` c0)= inf({ hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))}, ℝ*, <), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ovolval(hs1, hs0, c0, { hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))})
  eqid({ hs1 ∈ ℝ* | ∃(hs0 ∈((≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))[↦]ℕ),(c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ hs0))∧ hs1 = sup(ran(seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ hs0)))), ℝ*, <)))})

blocks.name: sca2rab
blocks.content: If ` B ` is a scale of ` A ` by ` C ` , then ` A ` is a scale of ` B ` by ` 1 / C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.)

thm sca2rab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2)))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  abbi2dv(s0, c0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2)))
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  sseld(cv(s0), c0, cr, w0)
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  3bitrd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), c0))
  eleq2d(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2, crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(c2, crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wb(wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), crab(s1, cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), c0)), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr))
  sylancom(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr))
  rprecred(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  remulcl(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cv(s0))
  elrab3(s1, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), cr, wcel(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), c0))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cmul, cv(s1)), c0, co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c1, cmul)
  eleq1d(co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), c0, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  eqtr3d(co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), cv(s0), co(c1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq2d(c1, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, c1), co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  divrec2d(cv(s0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  divcan2d(c1, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  recnd(cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  rpcnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  rpne0d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(c1, crp))
  df-rab(s0, cr, wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(c1, cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cmul, cv(s0))), c0)

  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ovolsca
blocks.content: The Lebesgue outer measure function respects scaling of sets by positive reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovolsca(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c0), co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c0), co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2)), wbr(cfv(covol, c0), cle, co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2)), wbr(co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2), cle, cfv(covol, c0)))
  eqbrtrd(co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2), cle, cfv(covol, c0), co(cfv(covol, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), w0)
  divrecd(cfv(covol, c1), c2, w0)
  recnd(cfv(covol, c1), w0)
  rpcnd(c2, w0)
  rpne0d(c2, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(co(cfv(covol, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), cle, cfv(covol, c0)), wbr(cfv(covol, c1), cle, co(cfv(covol, c0), cdiv, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))))
  ovolscalem2(hs0, c1, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c2), w0)
  sca2rab(hs0, s0, c1, c2, c0, w0)
  lemuldivd(cfv(covol, c1), co(nat1, cdiv, c2), cfv(covol, c0), w0)
  rpreccld(c2, w0)
  letri3d(cfv(covol, c0), co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, c0), cr), wss(c0, cr), wcel(co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2), cr), wbr(cfv(covol, c0), cle, co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2)))
  syl6eqss(c0, cr, crab(s0, cr, wcel(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), c1)), w0)
  ssrab2(s0, cr, wcel(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), c1))
  ovolscalem2(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ovollecl(c0, co(cfv(covol, c1), cdiv, c2))
  rerpdivcld(cfv(covol, c1), c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cdiv, c2))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: ovolicc2
blocks.content: The measure of a closed interval is upper bounded by its length. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ismbl
blocks.content: The predicate " ` A ` is Lebesgue-measurable". A set is measurable if it splits every other set ` x ` in a "nice" way, that is, if the measure of the pieces ` x i^i A ` and ` x \ A ` sum up to the measure of ` x ` (assuming that the measure of ` x ` is a real number, so that this addition makes sense). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  ralbidv(s0, cima(ccnv(covol), cr), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))))

  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cpw(cr)), wral(s0, cima(ccnv(covol), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0))))), wss(c0, cr), wral(s0, cpw(cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))))))
  elpw2(c0, cr)
  reex()
  ralbii2(s0, cima(ccnv(covol), cr), cpw(cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0))))))

  mpbirand(wa(wss(c0, cr), wa(wss(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), cr))), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))), wbr(co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0))), cle, cfv(covol, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(covol, cv(s0)), cle, co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(s0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(s0), c0)))))

blocks.name: volres
blocks.content: A self-referencing abbreviated definition of the Lebesgue measure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: volf
blocks.content: The domain and range of the Lebesgue measure function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm volf() {
  |- wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
} = {
  simpli(wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)))
  mpbi(wa(wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr))), wa(wfun(cvol), wss(cvol, cxp(cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  pm3.2i(wfun(cvol), wss(cvol, cxp(cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  mpbir(wfun(cvol), wfun(cres(covol, cdm(cvol))))
  mp2b(wfun(cres(covol, cdm(cvol))), wf(covol, cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wfun(covol))
  ffun(covol, cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  funres(covol, cdm(cvol))
  funeqi(cvol, cres(covol, cdm(cvol)))
  sstri(cvol, cxp(cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), covol)
  eqsstri(cvol, covol, cres(covol, cdm(cvol)))
  volres()
  resss(covol, cdm(cvol))
  ax-mp(wss(covol, cxp(cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))), wf(covol, cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ovolf()
  fssxp(covol, cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  funssxp(cvol, cpw(cr), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm volf() {
  ⊢ (vol : dom(vol)→(0[[,]]+∞))
} = {
  simpli((vol : dom(vol)→(0[[,]]+∞)), dom(vol)⊆ P(ℝ))
  mpbi(((vol : dom(vol)→(0[[,]]+∞))∧ dom(vol)⊆ P(ℝ)), (Fun(vol)∧ vol ⊆(P(ℝ)×(0[[,]]+∞))))
  pm3.2i(Fun(vol), vol ⊆(P(ℝ)×(0[[,]]+∞)))
  mpbir(Fun(vol), Fun((vol* |` dom(vol))))
  mp2b(Fun((vol* |` dom(vol))), (vol* : P(ℝ)→(0[[,]]+∞)), Fun(vol*))
  ffun(covol, P(ℝ), (0[[,]]+∞))
  funres(covol, dom(vol))
  funeqi(cvol, (vol* |` dom(vol)))
  sstri(cvol, (P(ℝ)×(0[[,]]+∞)), covol)
  eqsstri(cvol, covol, (vol* |` dom(vol)))
  volres()
  resss(covol, dom(vol))
  ax-mp(vol* ⊆(P(ℝ)×(0[[,]]+∞)), (vol* : P(ℝ)→(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ovolf()
  fssxp(covol, P(ℝ), (0[[,]]+∞))
  funssxp(cvol, P(ℝ), (0[[,]]+∞))
}

blocks.name: mblvol
blocks.content: The volume of a measurable set is the same as its outer volume. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: mblss
blocks.content: A measurable set is a subset of the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: mblsplit
blocks.content: The defining property of measurability. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mblsplit(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr)), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), co(cfv(covol, cin(c1, c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(c1, c0)))))
} = {
  3imp(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c1, cr), wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), co(cfv(covol, cin(c1, c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(c1, c0)))))
  syl5bir(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c1, cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), co(cfv(covol, cin(c1, c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(c1, c0))))), wcel(c1, cpw(cr)))
  elpw2(c1, cr)
  reex()
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wi(wcel(c1, cpw(cr)), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), co(cfv(covol, cin(c1, c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(c1, c0)))))), wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, cpw(cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)))))))
  ismbl(hs0, c0)

thm mblsplit(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ)→(vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0))))
} = {
  3imp(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ, (vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0))))
  syl5bir(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ⊆ ℝ, ((vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0)))), c1 ∈ P(ℝ))
  elpw2(c1, cr)
  reex()
  simplbiim(c0 ∈ dom(vol), (c1 ∈ P(ℝ)→((vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0))))), c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(ℝ),((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))))))
  ismbl(hs0, c0)
  rspccv(hs0, P(ℝ), c1, ((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0)))), ((vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0)))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), (vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ, (vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0))))
  eleq1d((vol* ` hs0), cr, (vol* ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  eqeq12d((vol* ` hs0), ((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), (vol* ` c1), ((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0))), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, covol)
  oveq12d((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0)), caddc, (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), (vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0)), (vol* `(c1 \ c0)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(covol, (hs0 ⋂ c0), (c1 ⋂ c0), hs0 = c1)
  ineq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  fveq2d(covol, (hs0 \ c0), (c1 \ c0), hs0 = c1)
  difeq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℝ))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((vol* ` c1)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` c1)=((vol* `(c1 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(c1 \ c0)))))
}

blocks.name: volss
blocks.content: The Lebesgue measure is monotone with respect to set inclusion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm volss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cvol, c0), cle, cfv(cvol, c1)))
} = {
  3brtr4d(cfv(cvol, c0), cle, cfv(cvol, c1), cfv(covol, c0), cfv(covol, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(covol, c0), cle, cfv(covol, c1)), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cr))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cr))
  mblss(c1)
  ovolss(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvol, c0), cfv(covol, c0)))
  mblvol(c0)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cvol, c1), cfv(covol, c1)))
  mblvol(c1)
}

thm volss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→(vol ` c0)[≤](vol ` c1))
} = {
  3brtr4d((vol ` c0), cle, (vol ` c1), (vol* ` c0), (vol* ` c1), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c0 ⊆ c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c0 ⊆ c1), (vol* ` c0)[≤](vol* ` c1), c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  simp3(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ c1)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  mblss(c1)
  ovolss(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ c1, (vol ` c0)=(vol* ` c0))
  mblvol(c0)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ c1, (vol ` c1)=(vol* ` c1))
  mblvol(c1)
}

  3eqtr4d(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c0))), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c0)))), co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), co(cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr)))

  3adant1(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cr))
  mp3an1(wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cr), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)))
  inss1(cv(hs0), c0)
  ovolsscl(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0))
  recnd(cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cr))
  mp3an1(wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cr), wss(cdif(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)))

  oveq12d(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c0))), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c0))), cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr)))

  syl6eqr(cdif(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c0)), cin(cv(hs0), c0), cdif(cv(hs0), cdif(cv(hs0), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr)))

thm cmmbl(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(vol)→(ℝ \ c0)∈ dom(vol))
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ dom(vol), (ℝ \ c0)∈ dom(vol), (ℝ \ c0)⊆ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(ℝ),((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)))[+](vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)))))))
  difssd(cr, c0, c0 ∈ dom(vol))
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(ℝ), c0 ∈ dom(vol), ((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)))[+](vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0))))))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ∈ P(ℝ), ((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →(vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)))[+](vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0))))), hs0 ⊆ ℝ)
  elpwi(hs0, cr)
  3expia(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)=((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)))[+](vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)))))
  3eqtr4d((vol* ` hs0), ((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)))[+](vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)))), ((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), ((vol* `(hs0 \ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  addcomd((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0)), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  recnd((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))∈ ℝ)
  mp3an1(hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))∈ ℝ, (hs0 ⋂ c0)⊆ hs0)
  inss1(hs0, c0)
  ovolsscl((hs0 ⋂ c0), hs0)
  recnd((vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* `(hs0 \ c0))∈ ℝ)
  mp3an1(hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* `(hs0 \ c0))∈ ℝ, (hs0 \ c0)⊆ hs0)
  difss(hs0, c0)
  ovolsscl((hs0 \ c0), hs0)
  mblsplit(c0, hs0)
  oveq12d((vol* `(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0))), caddc, (vol* `(hs0 \(ℝ \ c0))), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), (vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  fveq2d(covol, (hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 \ c0), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  fveq2d(covol, (hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 ⋂ c0), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  syl6eqr((hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 ⋂ c0), (hs0 \(hs0 \ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  syl5eqr((hs0 \(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 \(hs0 \ c0)), (hs0 \(hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0))), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  difin(hs0, (ℝ \ c0))
  difeq2d(hs0, (hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 \ c0), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))
  syl5eqr((hs0 ⋂(ℝ \ c0)), (hs0 \ c0), (ℝ ⋂(hs0 \ c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ))

  simp2(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: nulmbl
blocks.content: A nullset is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nulmbl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), nat0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), nat0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wss(c0, cr), wral(hs0, cpw(cr), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wbr(co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cle, cfv(covol, cv(hs0))))))
  simpl(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), nat0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(cr), wa(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), nat0)), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wbr(co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cle, cfv(covol, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan2(wa(wss(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c0), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr)), wi(wcel(cfv(covol, cv(hs0)), cr), wbr(co(cfv(covol, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), caddc, cfv(covol, cdif(cv(hs0), c0))), cle, cfv(covol, cv(hs0)))), wss(cv(hs0), cr))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), cr)

thm nulmbl(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)→ c0 ∈ dom(vol))
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), c0 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ⊆ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(ℝ),((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0)))[≤](vol* ` hs0))))
  simpl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)= 0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(ℝ), (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), ((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0)))[≤](vol* ` hs0)))
  sylan2((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), hs0 ∈ P(ℝ), ((vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ →((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0)))[≤](vol* ` hs0)), hs0 ⊆ ℝ)
  elpwi(hs0, cr)
  expr((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, ((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0)))[≤](vol* ` hs0))
  eqbrtrd(((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), cle, (vol* ` hs0), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)))
  eqtrd(((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), (0[+](vol* `(hs0 \ c0))), ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)))
  oveq1d((vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0)), caddc, (vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), nat0, ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)))
  adantr((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), (hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ), (vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))= 0)
  mp3an1(c0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c0)= 0, (vol* `(hs0 ⋂ c0))= 0, (hs0 ⋂ c0)⊆ c0)
  inss2(hs0, c0)
  ovolssnul((hs0 ⋂ c0), c0)
  addid2d((vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)))
  recnd((vol* `(hs0 \ c0)), ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)))
  adantl((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), (hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0))∈ ℝ)
  mp3an1(hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (vol* `(hs0 \ c0))∈ ℝ, (hs0 \ c0)⊆ hs0)
  ovolsscl((hs0 \ c0), hs0)
  sylancr(((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0)∧(hs0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)), (vol* `(hs0 \ c0))[≤](vol* ` hs0), (hs0 \ c0)⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ ℝ)
  difss(hs0, c0)
  simprl((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0), hs0 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  ovolss((hs0 \ c0), hs0)
  ismbl2(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧(vol* ` c0)= 0))

blocks.name: nulmbl2
blocks.content: A set of outer measure zero is measurable. The term "outer measure zero" here is slightly different from "nullset/negligible set"; a nullset has ` vol* ( A ) = 0 ` while "outer measure zero" means that for any ` x ` there is a ` y ` containing ` A ` with volume less than ` x ` . Assuming AC, these notions are equivalent (because the intersection of all such ` y ` is a nullset) but in ZF this is a strictly weaker notion. Proposition 563Gb of [Fremlin5] p. 193. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: rembl

blocks.name: unidmvol

blocks.name: inmbl
blocks.content: An intersection of measurable sets is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm inmbl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol))), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cdm(cvol)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cin(c0, c1), cdm(cvol), cdif(cr, cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol))))
  syl5eq(cdif(cr, cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1))), cin(c0, c1), cin(cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c0)), cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol))))
  difundi(cr, cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1))
  ineqan12d(cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c0)), cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c1)), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c0)), c0), wss(c0, cr))
  mblss(c0)
  dfss4(c0, cr)
  sylib(wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wceq(cdif(cr, cdif(cr, c1)), c1), wss(c1, cr))
  mblss(c1)
  dfss4(c1, cr)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol))), wcel(cdif(cr, cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1)), cdm(cvol)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cdif(cr, c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cdif(cr, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  cmmbl(c0)
  cmmbl(c1)
  unmbl(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1))
  cmmbl(cun(cdif(cr, c0), cdif(cr, c1)))
}

thm inmbl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ dom(vol))→(c0 ⋂ c1)∈ dom(vol))
} = {

blocks.content: Addition of non-disjoint sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Mar-2015.)

thm volinun(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.content: The volume of a disjoint finite union of measurable sets is the sum of the measures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: iundisj
blocks.content: Rewrite a countable union as a disjoint union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iundisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, cn, c0), ciun(s0, cn, cdif(c0, ciun(s1, co(nat1, cfzo, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {

blocks.name: iundisj2
blocks.content: A disjoint union is disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃ ran(c0)∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : ℕ → dom(vol)))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ ℕ ↦(vol* `(s2 ⋂(c0 ` s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)

blocks.name: voliunlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ voliun . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm voliunlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, cuni(crn(c0))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, cn, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cin(cv(s2), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cseq(nat1, caddc, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn, wcel(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cr)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cvol, cuni(crn(c0))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cfv(covol, cuni(crn(c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, cuni(crn(c0))), cfv(covol, cuni(crn(c0)))), wcel(cuni(crn(c0)), cdm(cvol)))
  voliunlem2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2, w0)
  mblvol(cuni(crn(c0)))
  xrletrid(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(c0))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(crn(c1), cxr))
  supxrcl(crn(c1))
  3brtr3d(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(c0))), cle, csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cfv(covol, ciun(s1, cn, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), cxr, clt), w0)
  ovoliun(s1, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), w0)
  eqid(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cdm(cvol)))
  mblss(cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cr, cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cr), wral(s0, cn, wcel(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cr)))
  rspccva(s0, cn, cv(s1), wcel(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cr), wcel(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cr, cfv(cvol, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  2fveq3(cv(s0), cv(s1), cvol, c0)
  fveq2d(covol, ciun(s1, cn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cuni(crn(c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(ciun(s1, cn, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cuni(crn(c0))), wfn(c0, cn))
  fniunfv(s1, c0, cn)
  supeq1d(crn(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(covol, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), cxr, clt, crn(c1), w0)

blocks.name: voliun
blocks.content: The Lebesgue measure function is countably additive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: volsup
blocks.content: The volume of the limit of an increasing sequence of measurable sets is the limit of the volumes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

thm iunmbl2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≼]ℕ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol)))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  imp(c0[≼]ℕ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol))
  sylbi(c0[≼]ℕ, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol)), (c0[≺]ℕ ∨ c0[≅]ℕ))
  brdom2(c0, cn)
  jaoi(c0[≺]ℕ, c0[≅]ℕ, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol)))
  syl(c0[≺]ℕ, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol)), c0[≺]_om)
  mpan2(c0[≺]ℕ, c0[≺]_om, ℕ[≅]_om)
  nnenom()
  sdomentr(c0, cn, com)
  sylbir(c0[≺]_om, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol))→ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol)), c0 ∈ Fin)
  isfinite(c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ dom(vol)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ dom(vol))

thm icombl1(class c0) {

  a1i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  ltpnf(c0)
  snunioo(c0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cun(csn(c0), co(c0, cioo, cpnf)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(csn(c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), cdm(cvol)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(csn(c0), cdm(cvol)), wss(csn(c0), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, csn(c0)), nat0))
  snssi(c0, cr)

  nulmbl(csn(c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, cioo, cpnf), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)

  unmbl(csn(c0), co(c0, cioo, cpnf))
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ →(c0[[,)]+∞)∈ dom(vol))

blocks.name: iccmbl
blocks.content: A closed real interval is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.)

thm iccmbl(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cdif(cr, cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cdm(cvol)))
  syl6eqel(cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cdm(cvol), cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), co(c1, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  difreicc(c0, c1)
  mp2an(wcel(cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), co(c1, cioo, cpnf)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(co(c1, cioo, cpnf), cdm(cvol)))

  ltlecasei(c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cfv(covol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cr))

  imdistani(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  ltle(c1, c0)
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  rexr(c1)
  ioo0(c0, c1)
  syl6eqel(cfv(covol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cr, nat0, wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))

  ovol0()

  eqeltrd(cfv(covol, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cr, co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

thm ioorcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)→(c1 ` c0)∈(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ran((,))↦ if(s0 = ∅, < 0, 0 >, < inf(s0, ℝ*, <), sup(s0, ℝ*, <)>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elind((c1 ` c0), cle, (ℝ × ℝ), (c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ))
  elin1d((c1 ` c0), cle, (ℝ* × ℝ*), (c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ran((,)), (vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c1 ` c0)∈(≤ ⋂(ℝ* × ℝ*)))
  ffvelrni(c0, ran((,)), c1, (≤ ⋂(ℝ* × ℝ*)))
  ioorf(s0, c1)
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, (c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ), (c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ))
  syl6eqel((c1 ` c0), (ℝ × ℝ), < 0, 0 >, ((c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ)∧ c0 = ∅))
  sylan9eq((c1 ` c0), < 0, 0 >, if(c0 = ∅, < 0, 0 >, < inf(c0, ℝ*, <), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)>), (c0 ∈ ran((,))∧(vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ), c0 = ∅)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ran((,)), (vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c1 ` c0)= if(c0 = ∅, < 0, 0 >, < inf(c0, ℝ*, <), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)>))
  ioorval(s0, c0, c1)
  iftrue(< 0, 0 >, < inf(c0, ℝ*, <), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)>, c0 = ∅)

  impl(c0 ∈ ran((,)), (vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ≠ ∅, (c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ran((,)), (((vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→(c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ*, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 =(hs0[(,)]hs1))))
  mp2b((c0 ∈ ran((,))↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ*, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 =(hs0[(,)]hs1)))), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ)), (,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ))
  ovelrn(hs0, hs1, cioo, cxr, cxr, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cxr, cxr, c0 =(hs0[(,)]hs1), (((vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→(c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ)))
  a1i((hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ*), (c0 =(hs0[(,)]hs1)→(((vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→(c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ))))
  mpbiri(c0 =(hs0[(,)]hs1), (((vol* ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→(c1 ` c0)∈(ℝ × ℝ)), (((vol* `(hs0[(,)]hs1))∈ ℝ ∧(hs0[(,)]hs1)≠ ∅)→(c1 `(hs0[(,)]hs1))∈(ℝ × ℝ)))
  eqeltrd((c1 `(hs0[(,)]hs1)), (ℝ × ℝ), < hs0, hs1 >, ((vol* `(hs0[(,)]hs1))∈ ℝ ∧(hs0[(,)]hs1)≠ ∅))
  adantl((vol* `(hs0[(,)]hs1))∈ ℝ, (hs0[(,)]hs1)≠ ∅, (c1 `(hs0[(,)]hs1))= < hs0, hs1 >)
  ioorinv2(s0, hs0, hs1, c1)
  syl(((vol* `(hs0[(,)]hs1))∈ ℝ ∧(hs0[(,)]hs1)≠ ∅), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(ℝ × ℝ), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))

blocks.name: uniiccdif
blocks.content: A union of closed intervals differs from the equivalent union of open intervals by a nullset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniiccdif(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
} = {
  jca(w0, wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0))
  syl5sseqr(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cun(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0)))), w0)
  ssun1(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0), wss(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cr), wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, cn))
  ssdifssd(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cr), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  ovolficcss(c0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, cn), wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, com), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, com), wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0)))), wbr(cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0))), cdom, com))
  sylc(w0, wbr(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdom, cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0)))), wcel(cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0))), universe), wss(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cun(cima(c1st, crn(c0)), cima(c2nd, crn(c0)))))

blocks.name: uniioovol
blocks.content: A disjoint union of open intervals has volume equal to the sum of the volume of the intervals. (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ voliun .) Lemma 565Ca of [Fremlin5] p. 213. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniioovol(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, cn, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(crn(c1), cxr))
  supxrcl(crn(c1))
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cle, csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))))
  ssid(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))
  ovollb(c0, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), c1)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cle, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), wral(hs0, crn(c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))))))

blocks.name: uniiccvol
blocks.content: An almost-disjoint union of closed intervals (disjoint interiors) has volume equal to the sum of the volume of the intervals. (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ voliun .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniiccvol(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, cn, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), cxr), wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cr))
  ovolcl(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))))
  syl(w0, wcel(csup(crn(c1), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(crn(c1), cxr))
  syl6ss(crn(c1), cxr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  frnd(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cn, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, cn, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  ovolsf(c0, c1, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0))
  eqid(ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0))

thm uniioombllem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : ℕ →(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ ℕ,((,)`(c1 ` s0))))
  ⊣ c2 = seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ c1)))
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ ran(((,)∘ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c4)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 : ℕ →(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ c6)))
  ⊣ c0 = seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ c6)))
  ⊣ (w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)[≤]((vol* ` c4)[+]c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), (w0 →(c1 : ℕ →(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ)))))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ ℕ,((,)`(c1 ` s0)))))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), c2 = seq(1(+,((abs ∘ -)∘ c1))))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), c3 = ⋃ ran(((,)∘ c1)))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), (w0 → c4 ⊆ ⋃ ran(((,)∘ c6))))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii((w0 → sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ), d(s0, w0))
  syl3anc(w0, sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ, ran(c0)⊆ ℝ, ran(c0)≠ ∅, sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)[<]+∞)
  syl6ss(ran(c0), cr, (0[[,)]+∞), w0)
  rge0ssre()
  sylib(w0, ran(c0)≠ ∅, dom(c0)≠ ∅)
  ne0d(dom(c0), nat1, w0)
  syl5eleqr(nat1, dom(c0), cn, w0)
  1nn()
  fdmd(c0, cn, (0[[,)]+∞), w0)
  necon3bii(dom(c0), emptycls, ran(c0), emptycls)
  dm0rn0(c0)
  xrlelttrd(sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <), cpnf, ((vol* ` c4)[+]c5), w0)
  syl(w0, sup(ran(c0), ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, ran(c0)⊆ ℝ*)
  syl6ss(ran(c0), cxr, (0[[,)]+∞), w0)
  frnd(c0, (0[[,)]+∞), cn, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 : ℕ →(0[[,)]+∞)), (c6 : ℕ →(≤ ⋂(ℝ × ℝ))))
  ovolsf(c6, c0, ((abs ∘ -)∘ c6))
  eqid(((abs ∘ -)∘ c6))
  icossxr(nat0, cpnf)
  supxrcl(ran(c0))
  rexrd(((vol* ` c4)[+]c5), w0)
  a1i(w0, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  ltpnfd(((vol* ` c4)[+]c5), w0)
  readdcld((vol* ` c4), c5, w0)
  rpred(c5, w0)

blocks.name: uniioombl
blocks.content: A disjoint union of open intervals is measurable. (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ iunmbl .) Lemma 565Ca of [Fremlin5] p. 214. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: uniiccmbl
blocks.content: An almost-disjoint union of closed intervals is measurable. (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ iunmbl .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniiccmbl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, cn, cfv(cioo, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(ccom(cabs, cmin), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cdm(cvol), cun(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))))
  simpld(w0, wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0))
  undif(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cun(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdm(cvol)))
  uniioombl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cdm(cvol)), wss(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0))
  ssdifssd(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cr), wf(c0, cn, cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  ovolficcss(c0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))))), nat0), wss(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0)))))
  uniiccdif(c0, w0)
  nulmbl(cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))))
  unmbl(cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0))), cdif(cuni(crn(ccom(cicc, c0))), cuni(crn(ccom(cioo, c0)))))
}

blocks.name: dyadf
blocks.content: The function ` F ` returns the endpoints of a dyadic rational covering of the real line. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)

thm dyadf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wf(c0, cxp(cz, cn0), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cz, cn0), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cz, cn0), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  mpbi(wf(c0, cxp(cz, cn0), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))), wral(s0, cz, wral(s1, cn0, wcel(cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))))
  rgen2(s0, s1, cz, cn0, wcel(cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr))))
  elind(cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cle, cxp(cr, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), wcel(cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cle), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cle, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cle, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  lep1d(cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)))
  syl112anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cle, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  nnred(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)))
  nngt0d(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), cn))
  lediv1(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))
  df-br(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cle, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))
  opelxpd(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cr, cr, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), cn))
  nndivre(cv(s0), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), cn))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  zre(cv(s0))
  peano2re(cv(s0))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), cn0), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), cn), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  nnexpcl(nat2, cv(s1))
  nndivre(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cin(cle, cxp(cr, cr)), c0)

  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cle, cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cle, cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cr, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)

blocks.content: Value of the dyadic rational function ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)

thm dyadval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cop(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cop(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cop(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, c0, cz, c1, cn0, c2, cop(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  opeq12d(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  oveqan12d(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), c0, co(nat2, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveqan12d(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)), co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, caddc, nat1)
  oveq2(cv(s1), c1, nat2, cexp)
  opex(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)

blocks.name: dyadovol
blocks.content: Volume of a dyadic rational interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dyadovol(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(covol, cfv(cicc, co(c0, c2, c1))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(covol, cfv(cicc, co(c0, c2, c1))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cfv(covol, co(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cicc, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  fveq2d(covol, cfv(cicc, co(c0, c2, c1)), co(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cicc, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cicc, co(c0, c2, c1)), co(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), cicc, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), cfv(cicc, cop(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))

blocks.name: dyadss
blocks.content: Two closed dyadic rational intervals are either in a subset relationship or are almost disjoint (the interiors are disjoint). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)

blocks.origin:
thm dyaddisjlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, cn0))), wbr(c2, cle, c3)), w3o(wss(cfv(cicc, co(c0, c4, c2)), cfv(cicc, co(c1, c4, c3))), wss(cfv(cicc, co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cicc, co(c0, c4, c2))), wceq(cin(cfv(cioo, co(c0, c4, c2)), cfv(cioo, co(c1, c4, c3))), emptycls)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  ltlecasei(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c3)), co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c2)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, cn0))), wbr(c2, cle, c3)), w3o(wss(cfv(cicc, co(c0, c4, c2)), cfv(cicc, co(c1, c4, c3))), wss(cfv(cicc, co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cicc, co(c0, c4, c2))), wceq(cin(cfv(cioo, co(c0, c4, c2)), cfv(cioo, co(c1, c4, c3))), emptycls)))

blocks.name: dyaddisj
blocks.content: Two closed dyadic rational intervals are either in a subset relationship or are almost disjoint (the interiors are disjoint). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dyaddisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wcel(c2, crn(c1))), w3o(wss(cfv(cicc, c0), cfv(cicc, c2)), wss(cfv(cicc, c2), cfv(cicc, c0)), wceq(cin(cfv(cioo, c0), cfv(cioo, c2)), emptycls)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))

blocks.name: dyadmaxlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ dyadmax . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dyadmaxlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wbr(c3, clt, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cfv(cicc, co(c0, c4, c2)), cfv(cicc, co(c1, c4, c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: dyadmax
blocks.content: Any nonempty set of dyadic rational intervals has a maximal element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dyadmbllem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ dyadmbl . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dyadmbllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(cima(cicc, c0)), cuni(cima(cicc, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cn0, cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s2, c0, wral(s3, c0, wi(wss(cfv(cicc, cv(s2)), cfv(cicc, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, crn(c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cuni(cima(cicc, c0)), cuni(cima(cicc, c1)))), diffss(s0, s2))

blocks.name: dyadmbl
blocks.content: Any union of dyadic rational intervals is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  ralrimiva(hs1, crab(hs0, crn(c1), wss(cfv(cicc, cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), wcel(cfv(cicc, cv(hs1)), cpw(c0)))

blocks.name: opnmbl
blocks.content: All open sets are measurable. This proof, via ~ dyadmbl and ~ uniioombl , shows that it is possible to avoid choice for measurability of open sets and hence continuous functions, which extends the choice-free consequences of Lebesgue measure considerably farther than would otherwise be possible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: opnmblALT
blocks.content: All open sets are measurable. This alternative proof of ~ opnmbl is significantly shorter, at the expense of invoking countable choice ~ ax-cc . (This was also the original proof before the current ~ opnmbl was discovered.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: volcn
blocks.content: The function formed by restricting a measurable set to a closed interval with a varying endpoint produces an increasing continuous function on the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: volivth
blocks.content: The Intermediate Value Theorem for the Lebesgue volume function. For any positive ` B <_ ( vol `` A ) ` , there is a measurable subset of ` A ` whose volume is ` B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: vitali
blocks.content: If the reals can be well-ordered, then there are non-measurable sets. The proof uses "Vitali sets", named for Giuseppe Vitali (1905). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.)
